original_text: And he overlaid the frames with gold, and made their rings of gold for holders for the bars, and overlaid the bars with gold.
korean_text: 그 널판들을 금으로 싸고 그 널판에 띠를 꿸 금 고리를 만들고 그 띠도 금으로 쌌더라

sentences.original_text: And he overlaid the frames with gold
and made their rings of gold for holders for the bars
sentences.korean_translation: 채들을 꿰기 위한 금 고리를 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: and overlaid the bars with gold
